name: deepseeker
title: Deepseek Quick Actions
description: Performs one-shot actions with DeepSeek and more
author: ViGeng

preferences.name: prompt_summarize
preferences.title: Summarize Prompt
preferences.description: The prompt for the summarize command
preferences.default: Summarize the text, please ignore the common sense (low information density) and only provide most informative content (high information densigty) in two versions: 1. a very short **TLDR** version 2. a normal concise version *Summary* and. They should bold keywords, use --- to separate two Summaries:

preferences.name: model_summarize
preferences.description: Override the global preferred model for this command
preferences.title: Model Override

preferences.name: prompt_rephrase
preferences.title: Rephrase Prompt
preferences.description: The prompt for the rephrase command
preferences.default: Rephrase the text with enhanced writing but without changing the meaning:

preferences.name: model_rephrase
preferences.description: Override the global preferred model for this command
preferences.title: Model Override

preferences.name: prompt_translate
preferences.title: Translate Prompt
preferences.description: The prompt for the translate command

preferences.name: model_translate
preferences.description: Override the global preferred model for this command
preferences.title: Model Override

preferences.name: first_language
preferences.title: First Language
preferences.description: All languages are firstly translated to this language

preferences.name: second_language
preferences.title: Second Language
preferences.description: If the provided text is in First Language, then translate to this language

preferences.name: lookup
preferences.label: Lookup Mode (Beta)
preferences.title: Lookup Mode (Beta)
preferences.description: Enable lookup mode to get the meaning of the selected single word

commands.name: fix
commands.title: Fix Writing
commands.description: Fix the writing of selected text

preferences.name: prompt_fix
preferences.title: Fix Prompt
preferences.description: The prompt for the fix command
preferences.default: Fix typos and grammar mistakes in the text without changing the meaning, bold the changed:

preferences.name: model_fix
preferences.description: Override the global preferred model for this command
preferences.title: Model Override

commands.name: why
commands.title: Why?
commands.description: Ask why a certain text is the way it is

preferences.name: prompt_why
preferences.title: Why Prompt
preferences.description: The prompt for the why command
preferences.default: Explain why the text has this declaration and what is the reasoning behind it (try to be concise and bold keywords, do not include slected declaration):

preferences.name: model_why
preferences.description: Override the global preferred model for this command
preferences.title: Model Override

preferences.name: prompt_what
preferences.title: What Prompt
preferences.description: The prompt for the what command
preferences.default: I have no knowledge regarding this, introduce the selected text/words/phrases and explain what it is (try to be concise and bold keywords:

preferences.name: model_what
preferences.description: Override the global preferred model for this command
preferences.title: Model Override
